verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus shall reign where'er the sun Does his successive journeys run; His kingdom stretch from shore to shore Till moons shall wax and wane no more.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: For Him shall endless prayer be made, And praises throng to crown His head; His Name, like sweet perfume shall rise With every morning sacrifice.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: People and realms of every tongue Dwell on His love with sweetest song; And infant voices shall proclaim Their early blessings on His Name.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Blessings abound where'er He reigns; The prisoner leaps to lose his chains, The weary find eternal rest, And all the sons of want are blest.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Where He displays His healing power Death and the curse are known no more; In Him the tribes of Adam boast More blessings than their father lost.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Let every creature rise and bring
Peculiar honors to our King,
Angels descend with songs again,
And earth repeat the loud Amen.
